DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant recruit patient , refer obesity clinic separate two group . The interdisciplinary treatment group receive intervention clinic 6 months.. The intervention include visit every 6 week include nursing consultation ( listen , psychological support , anthropometric measurement blood pressure ) , endocrinologist consultation , nutritionist consultation ( initial evaluation food intake counselling ) , psychologist consultation need , interactive group information session ( discuss following : diet , psychological aspect associate obesity , physical education , complication pharmacological treatment obesity ) , questionnaire individual cost visit . A control group monitor 6 month family physician , per usual . A biological assessment , questionnaire , test carry begin end program : questionnaire evaluate physical activity ( Sallis , Canada fitness survey ) ; quality life ( IWQOL-Lite , SF-36 ) ; motivation ( analogical visual Scales ) ; knowledge ( pretest post-test ) ; cost . Tests assess physical activity ( 6-minute walk test accelerometer ) also administer . After first 6 month , group follow obesity clinic another 12 month .
